about_the_game:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

In the romantic comedy Our Two Bedroom Story, the heroine suddenly finds herself living with a handsome bachelor who she happens to work with! There, she discovers sides of him nobody else sees in the office, and the two grow closer over the course of their secret cohabitation.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
You work for a publishing house and decide to start living on your own.
But a coworker’s in your new home?!
“This is my house… but you could live with me.”
When your new roommate hands you the key, your secret life together begins…

Characters:
Minato Okouchi "Bossy"
Kaoru Kirishima "Cool"
Shusei Hayakawa "The Nice Guy"
Chiaki Yuasa "Crafty"
Akiyoshi Zaizen "The Growler"

Contents
Includes "Main Stories" in the App "Love 365: Find Your Story".
Collection of Main Stories spanning the series up until the Proposal Epilogue for Minato Okouchi, Kaoru Kirishima, Shusei Hayakawa, Chiaki Yuasa, and Akiyoshi Zaizen.

Notices:
"the Proposal: His PoV" is only available in Japanese.

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages.

name: Our Two Bedroom Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
